entry.title: Open Studio
entry.content: General open studio hours. Michael McDermott, who teaches in the Graphic Design department, will be in the room to offer critique, technical advice, and general help. Free coffee while it lasts.
entry.summary: General open studio hours. Michael McDermott, who teaches in the Graphic Design department, will be in the room to offer critique, technical advice, and general help. Free coffee while it lasts.

entry.title: Open Studio
entry.content: New year, same set up. The first general open studio hours of the semester. Michael McDermott, who teaches in the Graphic Design department, will be in the room to offer critique, technical advice, and general help. Free coffee while it lasts.

entry.title: Late Night Edition
entry.content: Extended open studio hours for the final week of class. Michael McDermott, who teaches in the Graphic Design department, will be in the room to offer critique, technical advice, and general help. Free coffee for the early group, pizza when the sun sets.

entry.title: Grand Opening
entry.content: Friday Studio’s official first day. Come for the free coffee and stay to work among your friends and other students. Michael McDermott, who teaches in the Graphic Design department, will be in the room to offer critique, technical advice, and general help.
